early_blight.symptoms: Dark brown spots with concentric rings on leaves
early_blight.solution:
1. Remove infected leaves and improve air circulation
2. Apply copper-based fungicides like Mancozeb or Chlorothalonil
3. Use organic fungicides like neem oil or copper sulfate
4. Apply balanced NPK fertilizer (10-10-10) to strengthen plant immunity
5. Water at soil level to avoid wetting leaves

late_blight.symptoms: Water-soaked spots on leaves, white fuzzy growth
late_blight.solution:
1. Remove infected plants immediately
2. Apply systemic fungicides containing Metalaxyl or Azoxystrobin
3. Use protective fungicides like copper oxychloride
4. Apply calcium-rich fertilizers to strengthen cell walls
5. Avoid overhead watering and maintain proper spacing

leaf_spot.symptoms: Small brown spots with yellow halos on leaves
leaf_spot.solution:
1. Practice crop rotation and remove infected debris
2. Apply chlorothalonil-based fungicides
3. Use organic options like copper fungicides or Bacillus subtilis
4. Apply balanced fertilizer with micronutrients
5. Maintain proper spacing for air flow

powdery_mildew.symptoms: White powdery spots on leaves and stems
powdery_mildew.solution:
1. Apply sulfur-based fungicides
2. Use potassium bicarbonate or neem oil sprays
3. Apply systemic fungicides containing Trifloxystrobin
4. Use silicon-rich fertilizers to strengthen plant resistance
5. Improve air circulation and avoid overhead watering

downy_mildew.symptoms: Yellow angular spots on upper leaf surface
downy_mildew.solution:
1. Apply copper-based fungicides preventively
2. Use systemic fungicides with Mancozeb or Metalaxyl
3. Spray phosphorous acid-based fungicides
4. Apply balanced NPK fertilizer with added calcium
5. Water early in the day to reduce humidity

black_scurf.solution:
1. Apply azoxystrobin-based fungicides to soil
2. Use biological fungicides containing Trichoderma
3. Apply balanced NPK fertilizer (5-10-10)
4. Add organic matter to improve soil structure
5. Practice crop rotation and field sanitation

common_scab.symptoms: Rough, corky patches on tuber surface
common_scab.solution:
1. Maintain soil pH below 5.5
2. Apply sulfur-based soil amendments
3. Use calcium nitrate fertilizer during growing season
4. Ensure adequate soil moisture during tuber formation
5. Apply organic matter to improve soil health

blast.solution:
1. Apply systemic fungicides like Tricyclazole
2. Use preventive fungicides containing Isoprothiolane
3. Apply silicon-rich fertilizers
4. Maintain balanced nitrogen application
5. Ensure good field drainage

bacterial_blight.symptoms: Yellow to white stripes on leaf blades
bacterial_blight.solution:
1. Apply copper oxychloride as preventive measure
2. Use streptocycline for severe infections
3. Apply balanced NPK fertilizer (15-15-15)
4. Avoid excess nitrogen application
5. Maintain proper spacing and remove infected plants

rust.symptoms: Orange-brown pustules on leaves and stems
rust.solution:
1. Apply propiconazole-based fungicides
2. Use tebuconazole fungicides preventively
3. Apply balanced NPK fertilizer with micronutrients
4. Monitor fields regularly
5. Time planting to avoid favorable conditions

northern_leaf_blight.symptoms: Long, cigar-shaped gray-green lesions on leaves
northern_leaf_blight.solution:
1. Apply strobilurin-based fungicides
2. Use preventive fungicides with propiconazole
3. Apply balanced NPK fertilizer (10-20-20)
4. Remove crop debris after harvest
5. Rotate crops and plant resistant hybrids

common_rust.symptoms: Small, circular to elongated brown pustules on leaves
common_rust.solution:
1. Apply triazole fungicides early in season
2. Use chlorothalonil-based fungicides
3. Apply balanced fertilizer with zinc
4. Monitor fields regularly
5. Use resistant varieties

sudden_death.symptoms: Interveinal chlorosis and necrosis of leaves
sudden_death.solution:
1. Apply thiabendazole seed treatment
2. Use biological fungicides with Trichoderma
3. Apply balanced NPK fertilizer with manganese
4. Improve drainage and avoid compaction
5. Rotate crops and plant resistant varieties

brown_spot.symptoms: Dark brown spots with yellow halos on leaves
brown_spot.solution:
1. Apply strobilurin fungicides
2. Use copper-based fungicides preventively
3. Apply balanced fertilizer with potassium
4. Improve air circulation
5. Remove infected debris and rotate crops
